communication.commands

Interface iCommand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddPairCommand, AskPlayerCommand, ChatCommand, DisplayCardCommand, DisplayOpposingCardCommand, DrawCardCommand, EndGameCommand, EndTurnCommand, EndWarCommand, ForwardingCommand, GameListingCommand, GameServerDisconnectCommand, GameServerRegistrationCommand, GoFishCommand, HandCommand, JoinGameCommand, LoginCommand, PlayerInfoCommand, RecieveCardCommand, RoundStatusCommand, SendHandCommand, SpawnNewGameServerCommand, StartGameCommand, StartTurnCommand, StartWarCommand, UserRegistrationCommand

    public interface iCommand
    iCommand interface is the top level interface for all commands. Quite simply, it ensures that all commands will be able to designate a CommandType. When adding a new Command, simply implement this interface and store any data or methods you may need in the Command class itself. Implementing this interface will ensure that it's easy to send it over the network.
    Author:
    Collin Franzen
